task_group: Backend SDKs - Hardening, Docs, And Release Operations

tasks.title: Robust Error Handling And Recovery
deliverables: Typed exception hierarchy for network, auth, validation, and throttling errors.
Circuit-breaker style fail-fast option for sustained upstream failures.
acceptance_criteria: SDK consumers can branch on stable error codes without parsing raw message strings.

tasks.title: Documentation And Quickstart Quality Bar
deliverables: Per-language quickstart and secure configuration guide.
Operational guidance for api key rotation and incident handling.
Migration notes for future project_id requirement rollout.
acceptance_criteria: Quickstart guides are validated by runnable examples in docker CI.
Docs explicitly explain api key purpose, scope, and secure usage.

tasks.title: Release Pipeline And Compatibility Governance
deliverables: Automated publishing workflow per ecosystem with signing/checksum support where applicable.
Compatibility matrix by gateway/auth API version.
Deprecation policy for breaking contract changes.
acceptance_criteria: Release artifacts are reproducible and traceable to commit and contract version.
Breaking changes require explicit major-version workflow.

tasks.title: Supply Chain Security, Provenance, And Compliance Packaging
deliverables: SBOM generation and artifact provenance attestations for each language package release.
Artifact signing/checksum verification policy and distribution integrity checks.
Automated secret/license scanning gates in SDK release pipelines.
Security advisory workflow for vulnerability disclosure and patched release coordination.
acceptance_criteria: Release artifacts are verifiable against signed provenance metadata.
Stable release pipeline fails on unresolved critical security or license violations.
Consumers have documented process to verify package integrity before adoption.
